Avarkalai nokki) nir kuruviraka: ‘‘Avvarayin, unkal kurrankalukkaka (iraivan) unkalai en (atikkati tunpuruttit) tantikkiran? (Unmai) avvaranru. Ninkalum avanal pataikkappatta (marra) manitarkal (ponru)tan. (Ninkal avanutaiya pillaikalalla. Akave, unkalilum) avan natiyavarkalai mannikkiran; avan natiyavarkalai vetanai ceykiran.
